description: This novice pilot is one of thousands of ill-trained students whom Zeon sends to the front lines as its military situation worsens. Shot down on his first mission, Bernie accidentally obtains vital intelligence on the Federation`s new Gundam, and on this pretext he is assigned to the elite Cyclops commando team. His new teammates stick Bernie with the chore of babysitting the curious Al, and this odd pair soon strike up a strong friendship.
name: Bernard Wiseman
